meanings.sent1: The fruited tree looked beautiful in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The farmer was happy to see his fruited orchard thriving.
meanings.sent3: The fruited tree seemed to be showing off its colorful bounty.
meanings.sent4: Her fruited garden was a symbol of abundance and prosperity.
meanings.sent5: The fruited branches swayed gently in the breeze, a sight to behold.

meanings.sent1: The fruited basket was a delightful sight at the market.
meanings.sent2: The fruited vines in the garden attracted many birds.
meanings.sent3: The fruited cake was a sweet temptation for all who passed by.
meanings.sent4: The fruited branches bent under the weight of their delicious burden.
meanings.sent5: The fruited tree was a colorful explosion of nature's bounty.

meanings.definition: Having fruit as a main ingredient
meanings.sent1: The fruited salad was a refreshing treat on a hot day.
meanings.sent2: The fruited smoothie was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent3: The fruited pizza raised some eyebrows, but it was surprisingly tasty.
meanings.sent4: The fruited dessert was the perfect way to end the meal.
meanings.sent5: The fruited cocktail was a fruity delight that everyone enjoyed.
